{"id":362065842,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1593885206,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"464 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/362065842/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ugly Number II","memory":"30.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    typedef unsigned long long int ulli; \n    int nthUglyNumber(int n) {\n        priority_queue<ulli, vector<ulli>, greater<ulli> > pq; \n        unordered_set<ulli> visited; \n        if (n == 0) {\n            return 0; \n        }\n        pq.push(1); \n        \n        array<int, 3> dirs {2, 3, 5}; \n        for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {\n            ulli t = pq.top(); \n            pq.pop(); \n            for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {\n                ulli cand = t * dirs[j]; \n                if (visited.find(cand) == visited.end()) {\n                    pq.push(cand); \n                    visited.insert(cand); \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return pq.top(); \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ugly-number-ii"}
